Address the problem of Handwriting Recogniztion this project identifies handwriting from same person using Machine Learning Techniques in MATLAB. For this it uses Multilevel Neural Network.It uses 784-50-10 Multilevel neural network.For Training and Testing Dataset from MNIST is used.It uses 60000 differnet images for training Neural Network and then uses 10000 different images for testing and gives 94 percent atleast accuracy in identifying correct digit/character.It can also gives atleast 94 percent accuracy if there is noise disturbance of 10-20 percent in images.

It's wikipedia search engine project which fetches any keyword you typed in ,in just within a second.It uses 56 GB wikipedia data dump and gives most relevant top 10 results.It has facility to search based on fields also like you can search title:sachin body:flipkart then it will give results of sachin bansal and flipkart but if you give title:sachin body:cricket then it will give results of sachin tendulkar...
